name: keboola/db-import-export
description: Package allows to import files to Snowflake from multiple cloud storages

scripts.tests-synapse: SUITE=tests-synapse CREDENTIALS_IMPORT_TYPE=SAS CREDENTIALS_EXPORT_TYPE=MASTER_KEY TEMP_TABLE_TYPE=HEAP DEDUP_TYPE=TMP_TABLE phpunit --colors=always --testsuite synapse
scripts.tests-synapse-heap4000temp-optimized: SUITE=tests-synapse-heap4000temp-optimized CREDENTIALS_IMPORT_TYPE=SAS CREDENTIALS_EXPORT_TYPE=MASTER_KEY TEMP_TABLE_TYPE=HEAP4000 DEDUP_TYPE=CTAS phpunit --colors=always --testsuite tests-synapse-heap4000temp-optimized
scripts.tests-synapse-heap4000temp-optimized-has: SUITE=tests-synapse-heap4000temp-optimized-hash CREDENTIALS_IMPORT_TYPE=SAS CREDENTIALS_EXPORT_TYPE=MASTER_KEY TEMP_TABLE_TYPE=HEAP4000 DEDUP_TYPE=CTAS TABLE_DISTRIBUTION=HASH phpunit --colors=always --testsuite tests-synapse-heap4000temp-optimized
scripts.tests-synapse-columnstoretemp: SUITE=tests-synapse-columnstoretemp CREDENTIALS_IMPORT_TYPE=SAS CREDENTIALS_EXPORT_TYPE=MASTER_KEY TEMP_TABLE_TYPE=COLUMNSTORE DEDUP_TYPE=TMP_TABLE phpunit --colors=always --testsuite tests-synapse-columnstoretemp
scripts.tests-synapse-heap4000temp: SUITE=tests-synapse-heap4000temp CREDENTIALS_IMPORT_TYPE=SAS CREDENTIALS_EXPORT_TYPE=MASTER_KEY TEMP_TABLE_TYPE=HEAP4000 DEDUP_TYPE=TMP_TABLE phpunit --colors=always --testsuite tests-synapse-heap4000temp
scripts.tests-synapse-heap4000temp-hash: SUITE=tests-synapse-heap4000temp-hash CREDENTIALS_IMPORT_TYPE=SAS CREDENTIALS_EXPORT_TYPE=MASTER_KEY TEMP_TABLE_TYPE=HEAP4000 DEDUP_TYPE=TMP_TABLE TABLE_DISTRIBUTION=HASH phpunit --colors=always --testsuite tests-synapse-heap4000temp
scripts.tests-synapse-clusterdindextemp: SUITE=tests-synapse-clusterdindextemp CREDENTIALS_IMPORT_TYPE=SAS CREDENTIALS_EXPORT_TYPE=MASTER_KEY TEMP_TABLE_TYPE=CLUSTERED_INDEX DEDUP_TYPE=TMP_TABLE phpunit --colors=always --testsuite tests-synapse-clusterdindextemp
scripts.tests-synapse-mi: SUITE=tests-synapse-mi CREDENTIALS_IMPORT_TYPE=MANAGED_IDENTITY CREDENTIALS_EXPORT_TYPE=MANAGED_IDENTITY TEMP_TABLE_TYPE=HEAP DEDUP_TYPE=TMP_TABLE phpunit --colors=always --testsuite synapse-mi
